descriptionlist.description: Add custom widgets right on your homescreen. This includes widgets such as time/date and apple's today widgets.
Widgets can be selected by tapping on a placeholder icon in wiggle mode.
Developers, if you want to create your own custom widgets take a look at documentation link below.

changelog.change: Reimplement fix for crash due to city not selected for weather data
Change placeholder values to make it clear that data is unknown
